about_the_game:
What?

xVR is a realistic environment focussed, social platform primarily designed for VR but equally as enjoyable on a desktop PC.

Within, you'll find yourself inside a detailed world, designed around beautiful and immersive landscapes. Here you can socialise with friends, relax in nature, or go on a hike through the forests and fields.

You will also have complete control over the world to maximise your ability to chill. This includes being able to set the time of day, the weather or even the seasons.

Who?

All players will be connecting in to the same landscape together, so anyone you jump in with will be right there with you. Just open, pick a name and connect.

When?

The platform is currently still in it's alpha design phase, though it is already usable as-is. Expect substantial changes to both the feel of the environment and the physical world itself. More functionality will be added over time such as vehicles, shared video watching and interactable physics toys.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: i5-9600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Any SteamVR compatible headset.
